column5: Graduate studies in architectural engineering are offered through the Department of Civil, Environmental and Architectural Engineering. The department offers a Master of Science degree with study emphases in several major areas:building systems engineeringconstruction engineering and managementglobal engineeringFor more information, visit the department's Graduate Studies webpage.RequirementsFor a Master of Science (MS) degree in architectural engineering, students may undertake Plan I (with a thesis) or Plan II (with a project).
